Class.name: EntryPath
Class.summary: Represents a path to a directory or file.

Instance.name: Indexer[Int32]
Instance.summary: Gets the route at the specified index.
Instance.param: The index of the route to retrieve.
Instance.value: A representing the route at the specified index.

Instance.name: Indexer[Index]
Instance.summary: Gets the route at the specified index using an index object.
Instance.param: The index object indicating the route to retrieve.
Instance.value: A representing the route at the specified index.

Instance.name: Indexer[Range]
Instance.summary: Gets a sub path using the specified range.
Instance.param: The range specifying the sub path.

Instance.name: Length
Instance.summary: Gets the number of routes in the EntryPath.
Instance.value: An representing number of routes in the EntryPath."

Instance.name: StringPath
Instance.summary: Gets the path as a string.

Instance.name: DirectoryName
Instance.summary: Gets the directory name part of the current entry path.
Instance.value: An representing the directory name part of the current entry path.

Instance.name: EntryName
Instance.summary: Gets the entry name part of the current entry path.
Instance.value: An representing the entry name part of the current entry path.

Instance.name: IsSubPathOf[EntryPath]
Instance.summary: Determines if the current entry path is a subpath of the specified other path.
Instance.param: The other entry path to compare against.
Instance.returns: true if the current entry path is a subpath of the other path; otherwise, false.

Instance.name: IsParentPathOf[EntryPath]
Instance.summary: Determines if the current entry path is a parent path of the specified other path.
Instance.param: The other entry path to compare against.
Instance.returns: true if the current entry path is a parent path of the other path; otherwise, false.

Class.name: CreateFromPath[String]
Class.summary: Creates an instance from the specified path.
Class.param: The path to create an from.
Class.returns: An instance representing the specified path.
